power4mome: Power Analysis for Moderation and Mediation

Source: R/power4mome-package.R
power4mome-package.Rd

Power analysis and sample size determination for moderation, mediation, and moderated mediation in models fitted by structural equation modeling.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://sfcheung.github.io/power4mome/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/sfcheung/power4mome/issues
